name: tui-kit-ai
description: TUI-Kit-AI Monorepo - shadcn/ui for Terminal with Vercel AI SDK

scripts.validate:tsc: npm run validate:tsc:packages && npm run validate:tsc:examples
scripts.validate:tsc:packages: tsc --noEmit -p packages/core/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p packages/ai/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p packages/agents/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p packages/providers/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p packages/cli/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p packages/chat-tui/tsconfig.json
scripts.clean: npm run clean:packages && npm run clean:examples
scripts.build:examples: npm run build -w examples/chat-cli -w examples/core-gallery -w examples/ai-chat-app
scripts.clean:examples: npm run clean -w examples/chat-cli -w examples/core-gallery -w examples/ai-chat-app
scripts.start:chat-cli: npm run build:packages && npm run build -w examples/chat-cli && node examples/chat-cli/dist/index.js
scripts.start:core-gallery: npm run build:packages && npm run build -w examples/core-gallery && node examples/core-gallery/dist/index.js
scripts.start:ai-chat-app: npm run build:packages && npm run build -w examples/ai-chat-app && node examples/ai-chat-app/dist/index.js
